Note: All development work fees are deducted from overall North Star development fee (2-3% of total development costs)
Funding Advantage
ESG alignment enables institutions to fulfill impact investment mandates while supporting strategic community development objectives. The Community Reinvestment Act provides additional leverage, as banks are required to help meet credit needs of low- and moderate-income neighborhoods, with over $3 trillion in CRA-qualifying mortgages and small business loans made from 2009-2020. Banks account for 85% of Low Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) investment dollars, primarily driven by CRA compliance requirements. This creates a compelling value proposition combining financial returns, social impact, regulatory compliance benefits, and community reinvestment objectives.
